classthings module¶

This is a docstring for the module ‘classthings.py’

class classthings.person(name='Unknown', height_cm=None, weight_kg=None)¶

This class person represents an employee with several attributes.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – Name of person
  • staffno (int) – Staff or employee number of person
  • height_cm (float) – Height of person in cm
  • weight_kg (float) – Weight of person in kg
  • bmi (float) – Calculated BMI of person
calc_bmi()¶

Calculates BMI.
